sentences.en: But for some people merely imagining this scene creates an adrenaline surge.

sentences.en: But Nic Cage can do more than adrenaline - pumped action block busters.

sentences.en: Dopamine and adrenaline are derived from the amino acid tyrosine.

sentences.en: He doesn't need a last jolt of adrenaline or dose of adulation.

sentences.en: He felt a surge of pure adrenaline as he won the race.

sentences.en: I can see the sheen of perspiration and smell the adrenaline fueling it.

sentences.en: It energizes us by pumping the hormone adrenaline into our systems.

sentences.en: It releases adrenaline and can interfere with sleep, increase tension, and decrease the immune systems ability to protect the body.

sentences.en: It's like adrenaline, the pain is such a sudden rush for me.

sentences.en: Little changes in plasma adrenaline were observed after both exercises.

sentences.cn: 剌激肾上腺素的分泌,有助纾缓压力、消除疲劳.

sentences.en: Take all of the energy and adrenaline circulating through your body due to that event and use it to your advantage.

sentences.en: The adrenaline was coursing through his system.
The applause acted on her like a shot of adrenaline.

sentences.en: The movie clearly runs on more adrenaline than accuracy.
